title: Vaishnavi Emerald & Diamond Haaram - A Timeless Statement
materials: Natural Zambian Emeralds (Excellent Cut and Clarity). Features a signature Hyderabadi Polish.
features: This exquisite Haaram showcases a delicate floral design meticulously crafted with brilliant-cut diamonds. The vibrant Zambian emeralds add a touch of regal elegance. The cascade design culminates in a captivating emerald pendant surrounded by a halo of shimmering diamonds. The necklace features a multi-strand gold chain for a luxurious feel and flexible fit.
occasions: and significant milestones. This Haaram elevates any festive attire and serves as a cherished heirloom.
description: A harmonious blend of traditional artistry and modern design, this Haaram is a true masterpiece. The exceptional quality of the diamonds and emeralds, combined with the Hyderabadi Polish, ensures enduring brilliance. It's a statement piece that reflects sophistication, cultural pride, and timeless beauty.
